segments.text: Hello . Can you tell me what the procedures of applying for a job are ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , of course . There are many steps . You can apply for the job on the Internet and then send your resume to the e-mail address of the company . And wail the feedback of the company .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What is the qualification needed by the position ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You must have over 2 years'experience first .
segments.speaker: S2
